title: Statistical Generalization of Robot Movement in Autoencoder Latent Space

author: Rok Pahič, Department for Automation, Biocybernetics and Robotics, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: Earth.
The majority of today robots are industrial workers.
They work in the industry, in structure, predictable environment for data, escarp, reprogram it and then the task change.
They are reprogrammed to new task.
When we won our own robotic Butler, we must ensure that he works in an unpredictable environment, like when we wanted to clean our messy room.
Our messy room is very unpredictable environment and we cannot.
Preprogram, Roberto.
All situation that can happen.
So one approach to the learning of robots is imitation learning.
When we show robot some movement from some desk examples and then robot with statistical generalization adapts this knowledge to new task generally.
Desk variation and executes the job.
No.
In usually the robot movement is presented through time dependencies, joint movement like for every joint there is some time function.
How do you join should move and with very complicated robot with very.

The test so much joints the learning for each function is complicated, so we can make learning for robot simple when we find some hidden representation that can connect all this movement in some low dimensional space.
One approach to encoding.
That movement in low dimension is use of autoencoders.
These are the neural networks which filing numbers of neurons that restrict flow of information through it and ensures that the auto encoder prioritize just the important information.
So the.
Let in space who is lower dimension that our outside space is more proper for learning.
In our approach, we use it out encoder to lower 3 dimensions of robot.
Throwing a ball to one dimension and then in this little space usage statistical generalization for learning robot to throw a ball on different different location.
The testing now is in the face when we using a simulator in the future work we will use the real robot.
And we hope that we learn how to throw and that he hasn't some grudge against us.
Thank you, this is all from my site.
